definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon
exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish

sentences.english: We are looking for energetic candidates with good caliber to join Shanghai Representative Office.
sentences.chinese: 我們誠聘充滿活力及有才能的人士加入上海代表處。

sentences.english: The person in-charge of a representative office shall be the chief representative.
sentences.chinese: 代表處主要負責人稱首席代表。

sentences.english: He will join Freshfields' Hong Kong office in July.
sentences.chinese: 他將在七月加入富爾德香港代表處。

sentences.english: Shanghai Representative Office, Hitachi Data Syste Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 日立數據存儲系統有限公司上海代表處。

sentences.english: Cheong will be relocating to Singapore from the firm's headquarters to head up the new branch.
sentences.chinese: 昌將由律所總部調至新加坡去領導新的代表處。

sentences.english: The representative office of CLNG is located at Ming Wah International Convention Centre in Nanshan, Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 代表處設立在深圳市南山區明華國際會議中心。

sentences.english: Introduce the method of levying on the representative office
sentences.chinese: 對代表處的徵稅方法有幾種？

sentences.english: Interview by Ms Cui, University of the Arts London-China Recruitment Office, London.
sentences.chinese: 接受倫敦藝術大學中國代表處崔主任專訪，倫敦。

sentences.english: Jia Yan, Partner, Paul Hastings Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 嚴嘉，普衡上海代表處合夥人。

sentences.english: MHI opened its Middle East Representative Office in Dubai in 2006.
sentences.chinese: 2006年三菱重工開設中東代表處在迪拜。

sentences.english: We are looking for a Sales Engineer for DELO Shanghai Representative Office.
sentences.chinese: DELO公司上海代表處現招聘一名銷售工程師。

sentences.english: Alternate name for the Grenache grape in Spain.
sentences.chinese: 候補名稱爲代表處葡萄在西班牙。

definition: to dispatch (sb) in an official capacity/to be posted (as an ambassador, foreign correspondent etc)
